name: Bengbo: Deéjudé Casino
description:
Roll dice, enemies die. Simple. Efficient. Bengbo.

Bengbo: Deéjude Casino is a roguelike first-person shooter game where you cycle between fighting increasingly difficult enemy waves in the casino arena and upgrading your weapon in the casino lounge.

Game by Leo Wognum

Playtesting

Current build is for playtesting purposes, more specifically balancing playtest testing the difficulty of the game's enemies & bosses, damage scaling as well as the economy & pricing. But the survey will also have questions regarding other subjects as well as free input.

The next playtest will be concerning customization , progression & replayability once the customization have been expanded on.

If you have time after playing the build, please fill out the survey below!

Link to playtest survey

Controls:

Movement: WASD, Spacebar to jump

Move the mouse to look around

Combat: Left-Click to shoot, R to reload, Q to melee,

E to interact with NPC:s and Objects

Escape to open option menu
